body.ab: <lb n="c56-0011__main__1"/><del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0011__main__d2e13"/>sevr<del eID="c56-0011__main__d2e13"/> servants had any request tomake <lb n="c56-0011__main__2"/> it always through <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0011__main__d2e20"/>the<del eID="c56-0011__main__d2e20"/>her intercession of <lb n="c56-0011__main__3"/> Elizabeth<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0011__main__d2e34"/> For me I loved he<del eID="c56-0011__main__d2e34"/>We agreed <lb n="c56-0011__main__4"/> perfectly although there were many<metamark function="displacement" spanTo="#c56-0011.06" xml:id="c56-0011.07"></metamark><lb n="c56-0011__left_margin__1"/><metamark function="displacement">X</metamark> We were strangers <lb n="c56-0011__left_margin__2"/> to any species <lb n="c56-0011__left_margin__3"/><metamark>X</metamark> of disunion <lb n="c56-0011__left_margin__4"/> or dispute <lb n="c56-0011__left_margin__5"/><metamark function="separate">_____________</metamark><lb n="c56-0011__left_margin__1"/> X <lb n="c56-0011__left_margin__2"/> X<lb n="c56-0011__main__5"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0011__main__d2e93"/>There<del eID="c56-0011__main__d2e93"/>For, although<lb n="c56-0011__main__6"/> was a great dissimilitude in our <lb n="c56-0011__main__7"/> characters.<metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c56-0011.09">X</metamark><lb n="c56-0011__left_margin__1"/><metamark>X</metamark> yet <lb n="c56-0011__left_margin__2"/> there was an <lb n="c56-0011__left_margin__3"/> harmony in <lb n="c56-0011__left_margin__4"/> that very diss<lb n="c56-0011__left_margin__5"/>imilitude– <lb n="c56-0011__left_margin__6"/><metamark function="separate">_____________</metamark> I was more calm and phi<lb n="c56-0011__main__8"/>losphical than my companion <lb n="c56-0011__main__9"/> Yet I was not <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0011__main__d2e150"/>n<del eID="c56-0011__main__d2e150"/> so mild or yielding. <lb n="c56-0011__main__10"/> My application was of longer endurance <lb n="c56-0011__main__11"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0011__main__d2e158"/>than hers<del eID="c56-0011__main__d2e158"/> but it was not so severe <lb n="c56-0011__main__12"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0011__main__d2e163"/>as hers<del eID="c56-0011__main__d2e163"/> whil<mdel>e</mdel>st it <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0011__main__d2e176"/>lasted<del eID="c56-0011__main__d2e176"/>enduredmyamusements <lb n="c56-0011__main__13"/> were studying old books of chemistry and natural magic those of Elizabeth were <lb n="c56-0011__main__15"/> drawing & music.<metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c56-0011.13">X</metamark><metamark function="displacement">X</metamark> <lb n="c56-0011__main__14"/> I delighted in investigating the facts relating to the actual world, she busied herself in <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>following the aerial creations of the poets.– The world was to me a secret which I desired to discover,–to to her it was a <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0011__left_margin__d2e258"/>haven<del eID="c56-0011__left_margin__d2e258"/>vacancy which she sought to people with imaginations of her own.
